name: MOON OMEN
description:
MOON
OMEN

The Moon... always there, floating into the night like a pale air balloon.
Our fate. Your fate.
The Moon. The MOON.
Are you alive? Are you happy? Are you scared?
The answer is on the Moon.
Are you on the Moon?
Find out the omens the Moon sends you. Every day. Every night.
All those strange things happening to you.
And reach the end.
A real, unskippable, "no-turning-back" end.
This time it's there.
She's there.
Waiting for you.

t
